v.v: Yahweh, show that I am innocent.
Yahweh, examine what I have done and test me;
I never forget that you are true to your covenant and faithfully love me;
I do not spend my time with liars,
I do not like to be with evil people,
Yahweh, I wash my hands to show that I am innocent.
we sing songs to thank you,
Yahweh, I love to be in the house where you live,
Do not get rid of me like you get rid of sinners;
people who are ready to do wicked things
But as for me, I always try to do what is right.
I stand in places where I am safe,

v: I always do what is right;
I have trusted in you and never doubted that you would help me.
thoroughly evaluate what I think in my inner being.
I conduct my life according to your faithfulness.
and I stay away from hypocrites.
As I join with others marching around your altar,
and we tell others the wonderful things that you have done.
in the place where your glory appears.
do not cause me to die like you cause those who murder people to die,
and those who are always taking bribes.
So act kindly toward me and rescue me.
and when all your people gather together, I praise you.
